name: openfin-perf-testing-framework
description: Configurable performance testing framework for OpenFin (Workspace + Container) and Electron

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd openfin/workspace && npm install && cd ../container && npm install && cd ../../electron && npm install
scripts.manual:kill: lsof -ti:3001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; pkill -9 -f OpenFin 2>/dev/null; pkill -f http-server 2>/dev/null; sleep 1; echo '[cleanup] Done'
scripts.manual:openfin-workspace: npm run manual:kill && trap 'kill 0 2>/dev/null' INT TERM EXIT; (cd openfin/workspace && npm run server) & sleep 2 && cd openfin/workspace && npx openfin -l --config=./manifest-manual.json; wait
scripts.manual:openfin-container: npm run manual:kill && trap 'kill 0 2>/dev/null' INT TERM EXIT; (cd openfin/container && npm run server) & sleep 2 && cd openfin/container && npx openfin -l --config=./manifest-manual.json; wait
